Grayson Allen scored 18 off the bench, making a team-high four 3-pointers

Pre-Game Insights: Bradley Beal returned after missing two of the last three games with a sprained left elbow
Post-Match Reflections: The Suns won its fourth in a row
Booker and Tyus Jones each made two free throws in the final 21 seconds to seal the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns had zero turnovers in the third quarter after committing nine in the first half
After shooting 27% from the field in the first half, Phoenix made 61% of its third-quarter shot attempts, including 50% (9 of 18) from 3-point range
Others: The Trail Blazers cut the deficit to 99-97 in the final minute
Devin Booker had 28 points, nine rebounds and nine assists
